items.title: Distressed Businesses Should Still Pay Their Lawyers
items.description: The amount of money a business may owe in legal fees is small in comparison to the pain that could be caused by going without counsel altogether.

items.title: Take The Law Department Compensation Survey!
items.description: Help us track compensation for in-house counsel and legal ops professionals.

items.title: Merry Christmas: 2025 Was A Record-Breaking Year For Greed
items.description: Greed will keep you in its thoughts and prayers in the new year.

items.title: Meme Stocks And The $10,000 Hourly Rate
items.description: Much like what happened with GameStop, could there be a perfect storm brewing to drive top rates upward to the unheard-of $10,000 rate?

items.title: The Day That ChatGPT Died: Lessons For The Rest Of Us
items.description: We need to think before we become overly reliant on any technology but particularly GenAI.
